title: GET_NTH_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE
content:
0xE50E52416CCF948B0xF125BFCC// GetNthClosestVehicleNode
BOOL GET_NTH_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE(float x, float y, float z, int nthClosest, Vector3* outPosition, int nodeFlags, float zMeasureMult, float zTolerance);Parameters:x: X coordinatey: Y coordinatez: Z coordinatenthClosest: The index of the node to returnoutPosition: Pointer to the found nodes coordsnodeFlags: Node flags, see GET_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODEzMeasureMult: How strongly the difference in the Z direction should be weightedzTolerance: How far apart the Z coords have to be before zMeasureMult kicks inReturns: Returns the nth closest vehicle node.Same as GET_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE, but returns the nth closest node instead of the first.
codeBlocks:
// GetNthClosestVehicleNode
BOOL GET_NTH_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE(float x, float y, float z, int nthClosest, Vector3* outPosition, int nodeFlags, float zMeasureMult, float zTolerance);
